## sanitizePhoneNumber() function

Sanitizes a phone number for text to speech.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function sanitizePhoneNumber(phoneNumber: string): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  phoneNumber | string | Phone number to be cleaned for text to speech |

<b>Returns:</b>

Cleaned phone number
